Name: Gekko Episode of Amelia
About the game: ■ What is Gekko? Gekko is the stage where swords, machines and ponytails appear in modern society. A school romantic comedy visual novel that depicts an exciting love pattern with five heroines. This work is the second in the Gekko series and offers the story of the tsundere policewoman 'Amelia'. ■ Story Time is modern. The largest machine product company 'Imperial Heavy Industries' Monopolize the share of 'Automata' Demand was spreading not only to industry but also to ordinary households. High school student 'Yuto' who attends 'Seioh High School' Unfortunately, he gets caught up in an automata runaway incident, but after a short break, the third-generation automata 'Nova' saves his life. The hideout was taken to 'Nova' as it was, and 'Yuto' was assigned a serious task. ―――― Become a lover with 5 school idols to defeat 'Mugen Tukuyomi'. 'Yuto' is his buddy 'Nova', He started the operation to become a heroine and a lover with the operation staff 'Kageyama'. This time the target is Amelia, the head of the Discipline Committee of Seioh High School, who uses force to suppress the delinquents spreading in the school and maintain public order. Justice without force is not justice. The absolute justice she embodies has a secret that no one knows... ■ Features ・ Unique and cute characters ・ A story of laughter, tears, and excitement ・School battle romantic comedy in which students fight each other with swords ・ Visual novel that can be enjoyed casually without choice ・ Play time 4-5 hours ・ Only mouse operation is supported
